channel.title: Copyright Protection on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Copyright Protection on FinanClub

item.title: MSFT
item.description: score:36 Chances: Microsoft’s AI software business is expected to be its fastest to reach $10 billion in revenue, indicating growth potential. Microsoft pledges copyright protection for Copilot users, which could boost its appeal to developers and software creators. Bill Gates’ investment in Anheuser-Busch InBev could pay off, potentially benefiting Microsoft indirectly.
